name: UpdateAccountHighlight
description:
Updates the highlight for a specified account.

Use this tool to update the highlight information for a given account by specifying either the internal account ID or an external ID. Appropriate when modifications to account highlights are needed.

parameters.name: highlight_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the highlight you wish to update. Ensure this accurately corresponds to the highlight needing modification.

value_schema.description: The ID of the highlight to update.

parameters.name: account_identifier
parameters.description: The internal account ID (UUID) or external ID (any string) of the account associated with the highlight.

value_schema.description: The ID or external ID of the account that the highlight belongs to.

parameters.name: updated_html_content
parameters.description: The updated HTML content for the account highlight.

value_schema.description: The updated HTML content for this highlight.

parameters.name: updated_expiration_timestamp
parameters.description: The new expiration timestamp for the highlight in RFC3339 format.
